A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never had to say I disliked a Star Wars film until now.  No character development or advancement at all\, they are all in the same place they were at the end of FA.  Plot and story were disjointed and choppy.  Luke's portrayal was just awful\, huge opportunity was missed here.  Finn was a great character who was very mishandled and his character did little to nothing in the movie.  Laura Dern's character was annoying and also used improperly\, brought in\, hated\, then liked then killed off.  My guess is that you will be able to go from 7 to 9 and skip 8 without missed a beat.
